extension_description.message: Extension to make the official VRChat website a bit more convenient

friends_location_enable_instance_user_co.message: Display a button to update the number of users in an instance
There is a 500-millisecond cooldown to prevent excessive access to VRChat
Pressing the update button will also display the capacity of that instance
It will be displayed as: Current number of users / Recommended number (Maximum number)

friends_location_hide_instance_user_coun.message: If you enable this option, the button to update the user count will also be hidden
